original_text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs; and no man could bind him, no, not with chains:
korean_text: 그 사람은 무덤 사이에 거처하는데 이제는 아무도 쇠사슬로도 맬 수 없게 되었으니

sentences.original_text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 무덤 사이에 거처를 두고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and no man could bind him
